
Some text
=========

Some more test with mathematics :math:`a = b` and more:

.. math::


   b = c
   c = \vec{v}

Yet more text

.. plot::
    :context:
    :nofigs:

    >>> import numpy as np
    >>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt


.. plot::
    :context:
    :nofigs:

    >>> a = 2
    >>> b = a
    >>> b * a
    >>> for i in range(3):
    ...     c = a * i
    >>> c
    4
